page.title: 19THE HEALTH CENTRE
page.content: The Health Centre is situated at the junction of Ballygudden Road and Main Street and was built in 1972. Doctor White and Dr. Hetherington have their surgeries there with three nurses to look after the treatment room. There are three receptionists (one full-time and two part_time). The Centre is open during the week from 8.30am to 6.00pm and on Saturday from 9-11am. There is only one doctor on call on Wednesday and Thursday. Generally they see 60 patients each day and have to write about 80 prescriptions daily but they are at their busiest during the winter months. The most common case they deal with is the treatment of verrucae. They have also had a few emergencies from the local building sites.
